name: Bios Arcana
description:
Dreameerkatz,  a team of dreamers video game developers, invites you into a mysterious adventure that revolves around the dangerous story of Jesica and her brother Joseph.

Jesica, a 26-year-old girl is visiting her brother, Joseph. She wakes up one-morning hearing strange noises inside the house. When she decides to go see what's going on, she discovers that Joseph hasn't been to work and has locked himself in his room. Jesica tries to communicate with his brother but he only responds with difficulty and asks her to move away. Jessica manages to reach the window of the room of his brother who is in total gloom. Joseph, who in dim light looks at himself with his semi-rotten flesh, asks Jesica to find a book called "Bios-Arcana" that is somewhere in the house since this document can help him heal from his sudden illness.

Help Jesica, the adventure girl, to discover what is happening with her brother, while you will be catching some bugs to feed Joseph because ...

  • Realistic 3D backgrounds that evoke a mysterious environment
  • Entertaining story
  • Story available in English and Spanish
  • Entertaining  puzzles
  • Creepy Sound effects for a better experience
  • Sound from zapsplat.com
  • Image render from turbosquid.com
  • Sfx from videvo.com
  • Music by Tim beek
